channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Ideas Emerge to End Gaza Conflict and Govern After War
item.description: As Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel and President Trump head into a meeting on Monday, new proposals are under discussion.

item.title: What Taylor Swift taught RBC CEO Dave McKay
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Investors are betting big on ‘prediction markets’ Kalshi and Polymarket—will the gamble pay off?
item.description: The two startups generated huge buzz by accurately predicting the 2024 election results. Their young founders still face long odds.

item.title: Tactics used in the Michigan church attack resemble a new ‘hybrid threat’ meant to maximize damage, security expert says
item.description: "That all creates chaos. It could create what we call a fatal funnel trying to drive people towards one location."

item.title: Which Federal Benefits and Services Continue During a Government Shutdown?
item.description: Without a deal in Congress by Tuesday, the government will run out of funding.

item.title: Bad Bunny Will Headline Super Bowl Halftime Show
item.description: The Latin superstar known for hits including “MIA,” “I Like It” and “Me Porto Bonito” will perform in February in Santa Clara, Calif.

item.title: Gunman in truck smashes into Michigan church and opens fire, killing at least 4 and injuring 8
item.description: The FBI is leading the investigation and considered it an “act of targeted violence,” said Ruben Coleman, a special agent in charge for the bureau.

item.title: Pro-Europeans Set to Win Pivotal Election in Moldova Despite Russian Meddling
item.description: With virtually all the results in, the party of President Maia Sandu was set to keep its majority in Parliament, in a vote widely seen as a showdown b...

item.title: David Marriott reveals the correct way to pronounce the popular hotel chain—and you’ve probably been doing it wrong
item.description: The Marriott empire traces back to 1927, when David's grandfather, J. Willard Marriott, opened a nine-stool A&W root beer stand in Washington, D.C.

item.title: The Missiles Threatening Taiwan
item.description: China’s rapidly growing missile force threatens Taiwan and the U.S. forces that protect the island.

item.title: The Man Expanding Trump’s Presidential Powers

item.title: New Ideas Emerge to End Gaza Conflict and Govern After War
item.description: As Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel and President Trump head into a meeting on Monday, new proposals are under discussion.

item.title: Trump and Netanyahu to Discuss Plans for Postwar Gaza
item.description: The president and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel are set to meet in Washington after a week in which Israel grew more isolated internatio...

item.title: Octopuses Invade English Coast, ‘Eating Anything in Their Path’
item.description: The highly intelligent cephalopods filled fishing nets and gobbled up crabs and lobsters in Devon and Cornwall this summer.
